name: Linksys | SPS2xx | Security | Authentication | Login (SYSLOG)
description: %AAA-I-CONNECT: User CLI session for user admin over telnet , source 10.8.4.19 destination  10.8.2.13 ACCEPTED

patterns.value_re: ^%AAA-I-CONNECT: User CLI session for user (?P<user>.+?) over (telnet|ssh) ?, source (?P<ip>\S+) destination  \S+ ACCEPTED$

name: Linksys | SPS2xx | Security | Authentication | Login #1 (SYSLOG)
description: SYSLOG: %AAA-I-CONNECT: New http connection for user admin, source 10.8.4.19 destination 10.8.2.13 ACCEPTED

patterns.value_re: ^%AAA-I-CONNECT: New http connection for user (?P<user>.+?), source (?P<ip>\S+) destination \S+ ACCEPTED$

name: Linksys | SPS2xx | Security | Authentication | Logout (SYSLOG)
description: %AAA-I-DISCONNECT: User CLI session for user admin over telnet , source 10.8.4.19 destination  10.8.2.13  TERMINATED. The Telnet/SSH session may still be connected.

patterns.value_re: ^%AAA-I-DISCONNECT: User CLI session for user (?P<user>.+?) over (telnet|ssh) ?, source (?P<ip>\S+) destination  \S+  TERMINATED\. The Telnet/SSH session may still be connected\.$

name: Linksys | SPS2xx | Security | Authentication | Logout #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %AAA-I-DISCONNECT: http connection for user admin, source 10.8.4.19 destination 10.8.2.13 TERMINATED

patterns.value_re: ^%AAA-I-DISCONNECT: http connection for user (?P<user>.+?), source (?P<ip>\S+) destination \S+ TERMINATED$

name: Linksys | SPS2xx | Security | Authentication | Login Failed (SYSLOG)
description: %AAA-W-REJECT: New ssh connection for user aerga, source 10.8.4.19 destination 10.8.3.115  REJECTED

patterns.value_re: ^%AAA-W-REJECT: New (ssh|telnet|http) connection for user (?P<user>.+), source (?P<ip>\S+) destination \S+  REJECTED$
